BlogEntry.Title: It's a Girl!
BlogEntry.Description:
Introducing Anne Elizabeth Beda

Beautiful little Anne was born at 1:10 am this morning.  She weight in at a healthy 9 points and 14 ounces and measures 20 20Â½ inches.  She has 10 fingers and 10 toes and Mom and Dad couldn't be happier.

More pictures to come soon.
